long_description: On warm-weather camping trips where a tight mummy bag might ruin your sleep, the Therm-a-Rest Vela(TM) Down Blanket offers the freedom to move, flip and adjust your temperature. Durable nylon shell features 650-fill-power down insulation; box-baffle construction keeps down from shifting around, so cold spots are prevented. Down insulation delivers an unsurpassed warmth-to-weight ratio; it's one of the lightest, warmest and most compressible insulations available. Vela Blanket is rated to keep you warm down to about 40degF, making it suitable for warm-weather 3-season outings. Pair the blanket up with a large Therm-a-Rest NeoAir Dream Sleeping Pad (sold separately) for excellent warmth and comfort while car camping. Also works well with most other sleeping pads; choose a lightweight pad for backpacking. Draft tubes and elasticized foot box create a seal around your mattress that keeps drafts at bay. Side snaps and the included Loop Kit allow you to attach the blanket directly to any mattress or another Therm-a-Rest blanket for the ultimate slumber party. Therm-a-Rest Vela Down Blanket includes a stuff sack.
